result.rationale: This species is only known from three localities in the Oyapock river. It has a restricted distribution with an extent of occurrence (EOO) of 3,675 km<sup>2</sup>. There are two locations based on the impacts of deforestation and these are leading to a continuing decline in habitat. Therefore, this species is assessed as Endangered.
result.geographicrange: This species is only known from three localities in the Oyapock river in French Guiana (Isbrücker and Nijssen 1984, Weber et al. 2012).
result.population: The original description and next collection were separated by 40 years, thus the species is considered as rare (Queiroz et al. 2019).
result.habitat: No specific habitat information is known for this species.
result.threats: The habitat of this species is under direct impact from deforestation.
result.conservationmeasures: The species is considered Endangered nationally in French Guiana (UICN France et al. 2017).
result.usetrade: This species, in the adult state, is extremely difficult to distinguish from Hypostomus gymnorhynchus with which it lives in syntopia, which leads to harvesting by fishermen (P.-Y. Le Bail pers. comm. 2021).
